FAQ's of Admin

Admin Login>Manage Data>Upload and Assign Data>Assign Branch>Assign Data Type>Assign Caller.
Note: 1.If same data needs to be assigned to multiple callers, Select multiple callers from the dropdown.
         2.If same caller calls for multiple branch, select multiple branches from the dropdown.
Admin Login>SMS>Buy SMS>Select SMS Package>Pay
Admin Login>Dashboard>Caller performance>Select Caller
Admin Login>Dashboard>Caller performance>Select Branch
Admin Login>Customize>Update PSF>Add>Select Sales or Service>Enter Question>Select Questions type(Rating or Yes/No)>Submit
Admin Login>Reports>Calling Report
From Date>To Date>Select Status>Select Sub Status>Select Service Center or Caller>Export
Admin Login>DashBoard>Caller performance>Select Caller
Admin Login>DashBoard>SC performance>Select Branch
Admin Login>Manage Profile>Add Caller against Branch>Enter Caller details(Username, Password and Mobile)>Select Service Center>Submit
Admin Login>Enter Customer Mobile Number in Search details>Click on View>Call Recording>Download
Admin Login>SMS>Send SMS>Enter Mobile Number>Enter Text>Send
Note : You can add multiple numbers separated by comma
Admin Login>Manage Profile>Select Caller against Branch>Click Edit>Enter new Username and Password>Click Update
Admin Login>Manage Profile>Click on Buy License
Admin Login>Manage Profile>Click on Renew Validity
